page.description: Exports all scripts and user defined functions (UDFs) to a file.

argument.name: Filename
argument.description: The name of a text file to contain your scripts and functions. If no filename is specified, then the function prompts for filename.

page.discussion: The EXPORT_SCRIPTS_AND_UDF() function exports all scripts and user defined functions (UDFs) to a file. If no filename is specified, Alpha Anywhere chooses a unique name based on current database.
page.tip: Put EXPORT_SCRIPTS_AND_UDF() in autoexec script to backup scripts and UDFs automatically every time a database is opened.
